message: You wake up, rub the crust out of your eyes and look around. You see four walls, and a ceiling. You're probably in a room. You check the ground. Yup. Floor. You're in a room.

The floor seems pretty solid. You think you can stand on it. Putting your foot onto the floor, you see it's quite solid and should support your weight. You stand on the floor and don't fall through. You're amazing!
